trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Bay Shore
There were no other sightings in Bay Shore on or around July 29th 2013
Summary: I took a picture of the star but when I viewed it on my computer I saw something else.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my back yard with my son and my dog and we were just sitting outside and I took a few pictures of some stars that I could get into focus with my camcorder. When I viewed the photos later, I noticed that to the left of the object there was an image so I magnified it and saw an object. I definitely believe that it is not another star, but some kind of UFO. It was further away then the star and it had a distinct shape. I'm sending two (2) pictures of the object. One is the normal pic the other is the object magnified.
